John Panzer wrote:
> 
> 
> Alan Dean wrote:
>  > ...
>  >
>  > PUT /robots.txt
>  >
>  > ... replaces the whole file
>  >
> How about
> 
> PUT /robots.txt
> Content-Range: bytes=50-80/ 500
> ...
> 
> ?
 > ...

This has been discussed often enough on the WebDAV mailing list.

The main problem is that it's hard to deploy, because many deployed 
servers ignore "Content-Range" upon PUT, so the request would damage the 
content.

The solution to this, again, is PATCH with a patch format that allows 
these kinds of modifications.

Best regards, Julian
